title: chouyatou Women's Retro Plaid Smocked Dress Spaghetti Strap Flounce Long Dress
description: Size Guide: XS=US 0-2, S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L= US 12-14, XL=US 16-18, XXL=US 20-22. Last picture is the size chart, if you are not sure about the size, please contact us without hesitation.
Fashion smocked plaid dress women with pockets, featuring cute spaghetti trap with sweet ruffles, shirred smock bust, a-line silhouette, flattering plaid dress for women to hide tummy.

Trendy plaid printed pattern. Elegant square neck. Sleeveless. Flowy flounce hem. Below the knee length. 2 side handy pockets. 4 color: khaki/sky blue/black/red. Also can wear as off the shoulder dress.
Elegant plaid long dress, plaid smocked dress, basic and simple checked pattern, color block retro visual vibe, put on it to be a beautiful princess!
Suitable for daily life, office work, school, street, dating, evening party, night club, going out, beach, cocktail, weddings, vacation, holidays and so on.
